Solarsoul ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ Shining Sleep 023

This Sunday, I present a special year-old two-hour episode.
The first hour will be filled with a variety of his style of music.
There will be quiet moments, and pretty much rhythmic)) especially the ending of the first hour)kind of my experiment.
The second hour will be completely in the atmosphere of ambient and is dedicated to post-rock-ambient group, consisting of two members, hailing from Nashville, USA.

Second hour:

Hammock ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ Ambient ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ post-rock band consisting of two members
(Andrew Thompson & Marc Byrd), a native of Nashville, USA.
The team created a few years, strong enough his own compositions.
Hammock combine the ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œrealÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ instruments with computer special effects and interesting results.
Hammock ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ it is very unclear, ephemeral, ghostly bridge between ambient and post rock.
Everything is permeated with sacred atmospherics and eternal peace.
It seems that lying in a hammock and staring off into the sky where clouds do not stop .
Day follows night and night day, and you keep lying and look. And do not pull away,
and not get tired, and do not want anything else, just look high, and dream.
This is music night sky and air flow. All lovers of meditative ambient music and soft, insinuating post-rock is devoted.

Hammock (Andrew Thompson & Marc Byrd)
